typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		make as string,
		mpg as string,
		cyl as string,
		disp as string,
		hp as string,
		drat as string,
		wt as string,
		qsec as string,
		vs as string,
		am as string,
		gear as string,
		carb as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SRCFILECARS
source(output(
		make as string,
		mpg as decimal(18,1),
		cyl as decimal(18,0),
		disp as decimal(18,1),
		hp as decimal(18,0),
		drat as decimal(18,2),
		wt as decimal(18,2),
		qsec as decimal(18,2),
		vs as decimal(18,0),
		am as decimal(18,0),
		gear as decimal(18,0),
		carb as decimal(18,0),
		status as integer,
		carskey as integer,
		maxkeys as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT   c.*, max(carskey) over (partition by 1)  maxkeys FROM [dbo].[cars] c',
	format: 'query') ~> SRCTBLCARS
SRCFILECARS, SRCTBLCARS lookup(SRCFILECARS@make == SRCTBLCARS@make,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Select1 split(isNull(carskey),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(NewRows, ExistRows)
DerivedColumn1 alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
SurrogateKey1 derive(status = 1,
		NewKeys = toInteger(surrogatekey+maxkeys)) ~> DerivedColumn1
ConditionalSplit1@ExistRows derive(status = 2) ~> DerivedColumn2
Lookup1 select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
DerivedColumn2 alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow2
ConditionalSplit1@NewRows keyGenerate(output(surrogatekey as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		make as string,
		mpg as decimal(18,1),
		cyl as decimal(18,0),
		disp as decimal(18,1),
		hp as decimal(18,0),
		drat as decimal(18,2),
		wt as decimal(18,2),
		qsec as decimal(18,2),
		vs as decimal(18,0),
		am as decimal(18,0),
		gear as decimal(18,0),
		carb as decimal(18,0),
		status as integer,
		carskey as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		make,
		mpg,
		cyl,
		disp,
		hp,
		drat,
		wt,
		qsec,
		vs,
		am,
		gear,
		carb,
		status,
		carskey = NewKeys
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
AlterRow2 sink(input(
		make as string,
		mpg as decimal(18,1),
		cyl as decimal(18,0),
		disp as decimal(18,1),
		hp as decimal(18,0),
		drat as decimal(18,2),
		wt as decimal(18,2),
		qsec as decimal(18,2),
		vs as decimal(18,0),
		am as decimal(18,0),
		gear as decimal(18,0),
		carb as decimal(18,0),
		status as integer,
		carskey as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['make'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		make,
		mpg,
		cyl,
		disp,
		hp,
		drat,
		wt,
		qsec,
		vs,
		am,
		gear,
		carb,
		status,
		carskey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink2
